title: Constantly Playing With People Who Use Botting Programs-----Wtf Riot??
body:
Hey Guys And Girls it has come to my attention over the last 10 or so games ive played in the howling abyss and even in sumoners rift ive been playing with people who use botting programs first items are always boots and no matter how many times I try to talk to them I get no response and they play exactly like bots they don't leave the fountain until minions spawn

I have a list of about 40 names that are confirmed bots so my question is what are you going to do about this garbage riot your so tight about people and verbal abuse etc what about bots that ruins the game even more

replies.body: if you see {{item:1001}}  first slot prepare for a shitty game.
They wont do anything, howling abyss has basically been bot central for about 3 years now.
Pretty sure we are getting into year 4
but it has gotten worse recently... like within the last few weeks i've seen about 3x as many bots as I did last season.
There tend to be spikes near the start of each season, fresh accounts tend to be bought each and every season so that is why.

I also remember reading about how the last dudes who were responsible for the oracle's extract bots (three german dudes) got busted, it would seem another crew has swooped in to seize the business opportunity.
nah most botters just use leaguesharp and use public scripts.

Sadly, bots are common on the howling abyss. It's hard for Riot to catch bots 1-30 because at lower levels it can be difficult to differentiate between genuine noobs and bots. All you can do is report the bots, including the word "bot" in your report, and ensure that even if these accounts are eventually sold, they will be banned in due time.

If everyone reported every bot they saw, no bot accounts would be sold because they'd all be banned, and it would not longer be a profitable business.

So is ARAM. Played 2 games of ARAM this morning, 1st game of the day 2 bots. 2nd game in a row 2 more bots. It's pathetic. There isn't even a real option to report them. Like does it go under cheating? Not only that why are these accounts who I would assume get reported every game aren't banned? It just goes to show how bullshit and retarded broken Riots reporting system is. The only effective reporting that works is the verb abuse one and that's because it's so easy for the automated system to pickup on certain keywords in game and act accordingly.
Make sure to describe it as "botting" in the description panel of your report.

It would not be quite likely for such a thing to happen in pvp, however this doesn't mean it won't happen at all in pvp. I had one game whereas one of the players in my team kept on running into the enemy turret range, feeding himself.
If you really want to avoid this problem, my solution for you would be playing party mode.
I had always assumed these were just feeders with the 'don't talk, just run it down mid repeatedly for 20min' mentality. I had never considered they might be bots.

That's not always possible. I'm sure there are people like myself who don't have many friends who play League. Busy work schedules, nightshift work... the different types of circumstances are endless. People shouldn't have to resort to partying up with other JUST to get a decent game. It's a baindaid fix at best and doesnt resolve anything. Riot just need to pull their finger out of there asses and do something. Stop making new champs, stop making new skins and focus on what's actually ruining the game for the majority. Too much focus has gone into other area's and on the pro scene and everyone else is being left behind with a game that's riddled with toxic players and bots.
